document_data.name: House Arnise
document_data.mainbody:
'''House Arnise''', also referred to as '''De'Arnise''',<ref group="note">In ''[[Baldur's Gate II: Shadows of Amn]]'', family members have the surname "De'Arnise" was a noble family of warriors from the nation of [[Amn]], during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. Unlike the many mercantile families that were so common in the nation, the Arnise family were well-renowned for their trade as warriors and soldiers-for-hire.

They were an honest, and somewhat simple noble family, who were fair and hospitable of the farmers that looked to them for protection and leadership.

Their [[Arnise Hold|familial hold]] was located west of the [[Trade Way]] in [[Zehoarastria]].
